MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L14 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Pilch Street, Gordon Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.40AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of repairs required to the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.45AM on 14th March 2021.
